meanings.definition: A person who is formally accepted as a member of an organization or group.
meanings.sent1: The new inductee received a certificate at the ceremony.
meanings.sent2: The inductee was warmly welcomed by the team.
meanings.sent3: The inductee accidentally wore mismatched socks to the induction ceremony.
meanings.sent4: Becoming an inductee opened the door to new opportunities.
meanings.sent5: The inductee's smile lit up the room as they joined the group.

meanings.definition: A person who is officially introduced into a position or role.
meanings.sent1: The company's newest inductee was eager to start their job.
meanings.sent2: As an inductee, she had to undergo training before taking on her responsibilities.
meanings.sent3: The inductee accidentally pressed the wrong button during the introduction speech.
meanings.sent4: Becoming an inductee felt like stepping into a whole new world.
meanings.sent5: The inductee's confidence shone through as they embraced their new role.
